description:
Welcome to Sage Surfaces! We're thrilled to invite you to join our dynamic team as a full-time Sales Consultant - Kitchen and Bath. If you're ready to take on an exciting role in Oklahoma City, OK area, working hybridly with travel opportunities, this could be the perfect fit for you!

As a Sales Consultant - Kitchen and Bath, you'll enjoy a competitive base salary with bonus potential. We offer Great Benefits including: a 401(k) plan with a 100% company match on the first 3%, paid time off, 9 paid holidays per year, and company-provided equipment. Join us to be part of a company that values innovation, integrity, and the growth of its employees. Ready to elevate your career? Apply now!

Discover Who We Are

Sage Surfaces is a leading provider of innovative kitchen and bathroom countertop materials. We take pride in offering an exclusive range, including allen + roth® quartz, granite, solid surface, Laminate, Traditions™ Butcher Block, and Derivati™ Porcelain countertops, available solely at Lowe's. Our mission is to revolutionize the retail installed countertop category by blending industry expertise with cutting-edge technologies, delivering added value to customers on behalf of retailers. At the heart of our success are the incredible individuals we bring on board. We're not just a company; we're a community that values respect, innovation, and going above and beyond. Our vibrant work environment encourages personal growth and celebrates the achievements of every team member.

A GLIMPSE INTO YOUR DAY

As a hybrid Sales Consultant - Kitchen and Bath, you'll play a crucial role in increasing countertop sales and market share in the Midwest region. Your responsibilities will include developing and implementing effective sales strategies, managing retail account performance, driving company initiatives, and fostering business relationships. Imagine a day filled with engaging client meetings, virtual and in-person training sessions, and driving key market initiatives. If you're ready to make a significant impact in a fast-paced environment, this role is for you!

What We Need From You

For this junior-level Sales Consultant - Kitchen and Bath position, we're looking for someone who is looking to grow and has the following qualifications:
• 1+ years of experience, maximum of 6 years (education is not a factor)
• Dynamic & charismatic personality
• Outstanding work ethic
• Self Starter

This full-time hybrid role must be able to travel a minimum of 50% overnight and 30% on the road in assigned territory.

READY TO TAKE YOUR CAREER TO THE NEXT LEVEL?

Don't miss this opportunity! Applying is quick, easy, and mobile-friendly. Take the next step toward success – fill out our initial application and join us on a journey of growth and achievement!
